results.content: You can learn from this course without a doubt. I think it can improve the "production value" by having a better microphone, using a better environment to record (sometimes you could hear another people on the background) and also a new screen capture software (since I saw the same banner for each screen recording every time). When typing code, the instructor sometimes doesn't talk and I'd recommend  for him to explain bit by bit what he is doing.
results.content_html: You can learn from this course without a doubt. I think it can improve the "production value" by having a better microphone, using a better environment to record (sometimes you could hear another people on the background) and also a new screen capture software (since I saw the same banner for each screen recording every time). When typing code, the instructor sometimes doesn't talk and I'd recommend for him to explain bit by bit what he is doing.

results.content: Spring security can be very involved. Senol describes the topic concisely and in just enough detail. If you want to understand how Angular interacts with Spring JWT, then this is an excellent resource.
results.content_html: Spring security can be very involved. Senol describes the topic concisely and in just enough detail. If you want to understand how Angular interacts with Spring JWT, then this is an excellent resource.
